name: The Last Way: Our Way [ EN Version ]
name_original: The Last Way: Our Way [ EN Version ]
description:
THIS IS THE ENGLISH VERSION OF THE GAME SUBMITTED BY 'LES COUZ' FOR THE CHILLD AND GAME JAM.
For the French WebGL version, please see here : https://les-couz.itch.io/the-last-way-our-way
===============================================================
The Last Way : Our Way is a Tactical RPG made in one week for the chill and game jam, organised by Studio 13/16, with the Centre Georges Pompidou.

Lore :

A virus has ravaged the world. Every one aged more than 25 is turning into a monster. Your team, composed of 4 young people, is trying to develop a vaccine to stop the pandemic. But the monsters are standing in their way...

Will you be able to beat them, find the vaccine, and save what's left of the world ?

===============================================================
This game has been made in 1 week for the Chill and Game Jam 2021 by team 'Les Couz'. ( see https://www.afjv.com/news/10524_mois-creation-jeu-video-centre-pompidou-game-jam...).

Credits :

Thomas Lecrivain - Game Design
Florian Ortega - Tile and Animation Art
Milia Barrière - Character and Animation Art
Junie Poli-Tessier - UI Design
Sasha Joffard - Sound Design
Yohann Degli Esposti - Game Development

===============================================================
